name: Helloworld
body:
### Hello Kiddy!
This is really just a stupid little HelloWorld to learn understand how Git + GitHub is set up and learn to use it. If you wanna fork this Project feel free. :)
But it is highly recommended you do the HelloKiddy-Routine yourself. :P
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Just so I don't forget this.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
